com.mindtree.dao.jdbc

Interface BankDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BankDaoImpl

    public interface BankDao
    Author:
    M1030608 This interface defines the headers of various methods implemented in DAO layer for the Bank application to interact with database.

    • Method Detail

      • validateLogin

        boolean validateLogin(Customer customer)
                      throws DaoException
        Parameters:
        customer -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DaoException - This method is meant to validate a user at the time he/she logins. The credentials entered by the user are validated against the data available in the database.
